column5: Sounds like I can't bring salted minnows if I get to Canada in September. Is the bait trapper by Savant Lake still open for business? It used to be called Troy & Penny's.

I believe it is in operation. Of course, did not use them in 2020, but we have for years. I tried to find their phone # but no luck. You might email Ryan at Press Lake Camp. He has had a business relationship with them. Also, the store at Silver Dollar may know.
